## RestDateApi interface

Definition of RestDateApi used for testing whether value is date and for serialization

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RestDateApi<TDate = any> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [isDate(value)](./rest.restdateapi.isdate.md) | Tests whether provided value is date |
|  [toString(value)](./rest.restdateapi.tostring.md) | Serialize date into string representation of date |
